name: Corned Beef Pâte
recipeYield: Six small servings as an appetizer
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound cooked corned beef cut into one-inch cubes
5 tablespoons creme fraiche, available in fancy food shops

recipeInstructions.text: Put the corned beef into the container of a food processor and blend thoroughly.
Add the creme fraiche and mustard and blend thoroughly. Spoon the mixture into a small crock or individual ramekins and smooth over the top. Serve with Melba toast.
